title: How Many Calories Are in a Pear?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a pear, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and more in a label-style breakdown with quick tweaks and FAQs.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Pear?
assumptions: Medium-sized fresh pear (~178 g), with skin, raw, no added sugars or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by pear variety, size, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium pear has about 101 kcal, with 5.5 g fiber and 0.6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a small pear?
faqs.a: A small pear (~148 g) has about 84 kcal.

faqs.q: Does a pear have a lot of fiber?
faqs.a: Yes, one medium pear provides 5.5 g of dietary fiber, about 20% of daily needs.
Very lowâ€”only 0.2 g total fat per medium pear, with no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a pear?
faqs.a: About 17 g of natural sugars per medium pear, mostly fructose.

faqs.q: Do calories change if the pear is ripe?
faqs.a: Riper pears may have slightly more sugars and calories due to starch conversion, but the difference is minimal.
